website_summaries.verdict: The Chaco Z/X1 Classic received a fair share of acknowledgments and criticisms. It is generally praised for its multiple colorways and performance on rough terrain. It is also appreciated for the strap design that grants freedom and its delivery of support that addresses plantar fasciitis. This product, however, still gave the rest some inconveniences like blistering. Therefore, if a potential buyer (who doesn’t mind its asking price) wants to be free of heel pain while tackling rugged trails, this product can deliver.
pros: Hordes of followers were very pleased with the color options of the Chaco Z/X1 Classic which they matched with different outfits
Tens of consumers with plantar fasciitis shared how happy they were to find a product with a kind of arch support that eases their heel pain
A majority of sandal owners were charmed by the freedom offered by this “no toe Chaco.”
According to several wearers, these sandals dried quickly after water encounters
A good number of buyers who tested the sandals on rough conditions raved about their durability
A handful of fans found this strappy hiker comfortable
cons: A few owners found the arch a bit too high
The sole was too chunky for some
Plenty of consumers were disappointed with the steep price of the Z/X1 Classic
A lot of wearers reported that they got blisters in the first few times of wearing this sandal
Even those who wore the wide version still reported about getting blisters
A couple of users found this gear to be a little heavy

customer_reviews.title: L O V E!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a 7.5 so I got the wider size in the 7 and it fits perfectly! I love the arch support and the adjustable straps! I think the NO TOE STRAP is the way to go!!! I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Mangrum

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are amazing! The support is great and the fit is ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing! The support is great and the fit is just as I expected. I'm usually a 9.5 but since they don't have that size I went with a half size down which worked out fine! I would definitely recommend breaking them in and wearing them a few times before going on super long walks or hikes in them.
customer_reviews.author: Sun~97!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE CHACOS!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of Chacos that I've tried in the last couple of weeks. This pair is by far my favorite! The previous 2 pairs had the toe straps, and I've come to realize that I'm not a toe strap type of person. No toe strap is where it's at comfort wise! The toe strap just felt like a noose around my big toes, and it drove me crazy. I couldn't get it to the right comfort level. These however are very comfortable. They will definitely be my go to shoe this summer!
customer_reviews.author: HollyR

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite sandal
customer_reviews.text: This sandal is as secure on my foot as a sneaker. I have a wide foot with a high arch. Because this sandal is adjustable without using Velcro, it is comfortable and attractive. The Chaco gives my arch support like not other sandal. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Pennyspal

customer_reviews.title: I love the NO TOE CHACO:)
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I wanted. I have owned chacos that had a toe and regretted it for 5 years but still managed to wear them. I decided to bite the bullet and spend the money for these and my feet have thanked me for it. No toe is better than with the toe in my book. Less friction while walking. And free toes:) I also tried the regular and wide. (I normally wear a 9 regular) but the wide on these is much more comfy for me.
customer_reviews.author: T&L17

customer_reviews.title: Cute but I guessed wrong on size
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8.5, and since my foot is somewhat wider than average in the front, I took a gamble on the size 9. But I didn't account for the fact that my toes are kind of curved, so these looked comically big on my feet. Plus, Chacos have very sturdy soles that are kind of stiff, and I'm afraid I'd trip over the protruding toes... so back they went! I'll look for an 8... maybe a W width... might actually need to find a store that carries them so I can get help with the strap adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: N. Stephan

customer_reviews.title: The best sandals out there
customer_reviews.text: I have put on 100+ miles on the trails with these shoes, and even find myself wearing them in my leisure. I couldn't be happier with these shoes. One suggestion I do have for potential buyers is to think carefully on weather you want a toe strap or not. I had previously bought a pair with a toe strap and I did not like them at all. The toe was uncomfortable and rubbed the wrong way. I bought this pair to replace them and gave the toe strap pair to my friend and she absolutely loves them. So I prefer no toe strap, she prefers with a toe strap. Depends on the person. Choose carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda BN

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, great for hiking, walking, or just daily use. I can tell these are going to last me a long time like everyone says. They are pretty cute, I wear them with and without socks. The only negative experience I have had is that they did rub a bit on my big toe a bit the first few times I wore them, but I now have a callus there and it is fine. Also after wearing for an extended period of time and taking them off, the texture in the footbed leaves my feet feeling a little sensitive/odd, but I am sure my feet will adjust to that in time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t a fan. The company was great to work with so it’s not on them. Shipping was fast product was what it was supposed to be but these literally gave me extensor tendinitis! I was put in a walking boot because after 3 days of wearing these because everyone kept saying that my foot just hadn’t adjusted yet. It was too narrow so it pushed the side of my feet up causing too much pressure on the top tendons of the foot! I sold them a week after I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah12

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are painful!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived in a timely manner and are the shoe that I ordered. The rating is about the painful experience of actually wearing this shoe. I have been trying to slowly break in the sandal, but within an hour of wearing them I have blisters on the inner parts of my feet and the bottom of my feet hurt. I was determined to not give up, but they are more pain than they are worth at this point. I am sad that I paid so much for these shoes that I can’t wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these sandals. I bought them because the heel of my foot hurting so bad (fasciitis). I'm used to wearing Old Navy flip flops because I'm really cheap, but fasciitis at 23? Ain't nobody got time for that. So I bit the bullet and paid for the shoes. I couldn't be happier with them. They are fantastic support for arch and heel. Very durable and high quality. My feet were feeling better after only one day of wearing these. They are pretty "clunky" at the base but it doesn't really bother me much. I would definitely purchase again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I have found for my plantar fasciitis. I learned after I threw them away after I discovered my lab puppy chewed a strap that they will repair them for a small fee. This appeals to my effort to leave as small a footprint on this earth as I can. Be patient worthy the fitting process. Once you get it right they are worth all the trouble, I only wish Chaco made a vegan winter shoe for the harsh Michigan winters I hope to not endure for too many more years.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamlover

customer_reviews.title: Heel Strap Length is Not Adjustable :o(
customer_reviews.text: I actually LOVE the look of these shoes, and the sole is absolutely comfortable! The big problem I have is that they ingeniously designed these sandals to be customized like no other but then sew the heel strap stationary so the length is fixed! Thus the heel strap is much too roomy, which lets my foot slide down the back of the sandal clear to the end of the sole, leaving a whole lot of room in front of my toes! Ridiculous. My regular size, then, is going back. They are way too expensive to put up with that nonsense. I have ordered a size smaller to see if they might work. If not, they are both going back.
customer_reviews.author: debi w

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I bought the ZX1 and the Z1. I had originally bought the ZX2 but the straps wouldn't stay adjusted properly and I would feel like my circulation in my big toe was being cut off from the toe strap. They would have been great otherwise so I opted for this version since it lacks the toe strangling strap. I couldn't decide between the ZX1 and the Z1 so I bought both, and I am glad I did! I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Factory reject?
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair of this style Chaco in the same size and it fits perfectly but this one seems to have been made poorly because it feels too big. I've compared the size of the soles with my other pair & they're exact so it must be how the straps fit. It's as if they are more narrow at the arch of my foot and the back strap is too long so they feel sloppy. Wish I would have work them around the house a little before immediately taking them outside because now I am stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Liquid_Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love them.
customer_reviews.text: These were so uncomfortable for me. The arch support is extreme, the heal is too narrow and they feel like bricks they are so heavy. After 2 days of wearing, hoping to break them in, I started to have Achilles’ tendon pain in my right ankle and knee pain. Definitely not worth it. Wore them into an REI and switched to a pair of Tevas. Night and day difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J. Perez

customer_reviews.title: If you’re considering buying it...buy it...but watch out for the blisters
customer_reviews.text: Theses are AMAZING to wear!!! I love them so much they practically made my other shoes obsolete. I literally wear theses everywhere I can. Even with socks on in the fall and spring. Only complaint is that they cause VERY painful blisters when new, but if you put a bandaid on them for the blister and be patient, the cords will get softer and then you won’t want to ever take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute sandals with support!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend trying these on at the store. I typically wear a size 8 but the arch aligned better on the size 7. Chaco sandals are cool because you can adjust how tight the straps are by pulling them. They are a continuous loop that goes inside the sole. Pretty cool! The sole is pretty solid. If you want a squishier sole like Teva’s have, I’d try the cloud models :)
customer_reviews.author: MoonBeam9

customer_reviews.title: 100% Love
customer_reviews.text: Chacos are my favorite. This is my second pair because I am a huge advocate for them. I have lived in them the past 2 summers and intend to for the rest of this summer. They are versatile, so they work in the water as well as on land. I wear them all day and don't have any pain. Good arch supports and straps that don't rub in uncomfortable places. Even good for people who have precisely broken their foot. HINT: TAKE CARE OF THEM. Wash them, floss them (pull the straps both directions), shower with them. This is going to save them and make them last much longer. There are more directions on the Chaco website about care.
customer_reviews.author: Samara

customer_reviews.title: Straps are very snug
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really comfortable and attractive. My daughter loves them. She is a size 8 shoe, we ordered an 8. She does not have wide feet, but rather is on the small/narrow end of 8. Although the shoe bed is plenty long, the straps are quite snug. If she every wanted to wear socks with them on cold nights, there would be no way. Update: she wore them during the summer. Her feet would swell with heat and activity making the shoes unwearable. Chaco says they will not replace the straps. An expensive mistake on our part.
customer_reviews.author: C. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes, I would definitely purchase these again and they were a great price.
customer_reviews.author: TED LEMEK

customer_reviews.title: I returned them.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a summer sandal that I could walk in comfortably. Quality shoes, but these were just wrong for me. The sole, and especially the heel, lift you higher up than it looks in the photos. I wear flats almost exclusively, so it felt like I was wearing platform shoes. I can’t imagine wearing these and walking on rough ground without stumbling. I think they were in my possession less than 48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine E. O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Do. Not. Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Literally the worst shoes I’ve ever worn. Wore them for a week solid at work as an elementary school teacher to prep for Disney. Everything was fine. Or so I though. 25,000 steps later and I was wishing for death. Sorry kids, mom can’t make it due to her shoes that are supportive bulky rocks attached to her feet. I paid $50 for these so I guess I’ll wear them once I forget how awful i feel currently.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: The arch is a little high for me; I'm breaking it in, but it didn't fit beautifully out of the box. The straps give me constant grief; they're adjustable, but I keep having to tug on them to keep the front from getting too tight as the day goes on. Maybe they will wear in after a while. Also, and this is probably just me being a klutz, but when they were brand new the rubber caught on my driveway and sent me for a spill. Ouch.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dirling

customer_reviews.title: Love this sandal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are the second pair of Chacos I have bought this summer. The first pair has the toe loop and while I like them a lot, I prefer these for every day use. I have wider feet and I find this style without the toe loop fits my foot a bit better. I love the quality of Chacos and hope that these two pair will last me for many years to come. I love that they stand behind their brand and offer repairs as needed. Happy to have both styles.
customer_reviews.author: Libby White

customer_reviews.title: I love chacos!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I have chacos with the toe straps and a pair without. And I like them both equally for different reasons. The ones with the toe you have to mess with over and over to make fit just right. But they’re much more secure and comfortable than the ones without the toes once you’ve adjusted them. The ones without rub a little when you first get them but you don’t have to consistently mess with them.
customer_reviews.author: LexiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE chacos! I worked as a camp counselor over the summer and wore these every day for hiking, rafting, kayaking, paddle boarding, etc. They are extremely high quality and durable. They fit great and I can be in my feet for hours without discomfort. My only problem was when I tried to “floss” the straps to get sand out of the inner mechanism, the strap got twisted inside the shoe and I got blisters on my fingers from the effort to untwist it!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, but very bulky and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit my feet perfectly and looked really nice. Unfortunately the shoes were very heavy and bulky. The arch of the shoe was in a weird spot and rubbed the bottom of my foot really bad when wearing. Returning item.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Not for me but great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Super cute. My only complaint is how heavy the bottoms are. I should’ve done more research on chacos. This is what should’ve been expected with the classic. I already have the clouds which are great. Light and what I’m looking for. I did return but the quality was all there. Great shoe just not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Horner

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: I thought I’m the only one who’s having a problem with this sandals high arch but I guess I was wrong. I bought it for my summer vacation overseas it was my fault that I didn’t try it out before going on vacation. This sandals has extremely high arch that it gave me blisters. Ruined my day.
customer_reviews.author: Amina

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead buy them they’re perfect!
customer_reviews.text: but true to your foot size! Since I always like to buy a size-up in other shoes i just bout these that same size out of force of habit. Thanks to my mistake there’s now plenty of toe room! But besides that they are perfect. After now over a year of hanging by the river, walking through rainy-and muddy weather, and just normal everyday wear they look about as new as the day I got them - after a good clean mind you. Go ahead buy them they’re perfect!
customer_reviews.author: BabyYoda23

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo great
customer_reviews.text: Loved these shoes ! I went camping and they were beyond perfect, the arch support is great and the shoe is so comfortable for walking. The only thing that is a downside is the small straps, I feel like they need to be thicker and once they get wet it’s IMPOSSIBLE to put your foot back in them you have to loosen them up so much and then retighten kinda of a hassle
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S

customer_reviews.title: The "wide" is a disappointment. It seems they added a lot of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The "wide" is a disappointment. It seems they added a lot of the rubber sole all the way around, but barely moved the straps out. Where the straps connect to the soles is still under my foot causing friction and blisters both to my arch and outer side of my foot. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi B

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: This are the best outdoor summer shoes ever. They can get wet and dry quickly. They have great support. They also have great grip - I walked in a really mossy river and other people were slipping all over but I was had great footing. Go ahead and buy these they are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Missutu

customer_reviews.title: Wide feet...up a size doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: If you have wide feet, going up a size may not be a solution because of where the arch support will land on your foot. I wear 9.5 and sometimes in wide depending on the shoe. I bought a 10 and as the picture shows, they were still too narrow for my foot and I had over and inch of extra sole in front of my toes. Not comfy for my size foot. I did really like their strap tightening through the sole. If the half sizes and the wide option was the same price I might have stayed with Chacos brand. Teva size 10 fit perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Neuenschwander

customer_reviews.title: love that all straps are adjustable for perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I have had many people rave about Chaco's and now I know why. They offer really good support and the straps are fully adjustable for the perfect fit. I will be using these for my trip to the Galapagos in January and know they will be perfect for hiking and for use in the water. My only complaint is, that in spite of other people reviewing differently, I had to size down. I am a 7 1/2, ordered an 8 and they were huge. I returned for size 7 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Laborde

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Chaco
customer_reviews.text: With the double strap, this version of Chaco sandals is a bit dressier than the usual rather chunky ones. As plain black, it can go with anything. Adjust once and you are good to go. I wear a 6.5 I most shoes, with a slightly wide foot, but the 6M is a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fregia

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love my chacos best Shoe purchase ever! I’m always waiting for winter to be done so I can wear my chacos again! I don’t have super high arches & have always bought cheap sandals so they did take a minute for me to get used to. But they have amazing grip! Went hiking in Zions in February a year or so ago & didn’t slide at all on a very muddy trail, even when hopping over a puddle in mud. Best shoes ever! Wanna buy my husband some.
customer_reviews.author: Aspen Call Neibaur

customer_reviews.title: Sandals for everyday life
customer_reviews.text: I originally did not order a wide and the shoes were too narrow. I usually do not wear wide shoes. When I reordered for a wide they fit great. I wear these everywhere. At the office, kayaking, days where I’m waliking a lot. I stand a lot at work and these make a difference to not kill my back! Love these shoes and I’m a fan of chacon now!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth K. Starnes

customer_reviews.title: Not enough strap for adjusting
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are very well made. I really wanted them to work. The problem is my feet, which are short and chubby with a high instep. The sole fit well and was comfortable, but there was not enough of the strap to adjust comfortably over my foot, so they were much too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are super comfortable...after you wear them for a couple of days. They did rub blisters on my big toes and outside of foot the first couple of times I wore them. Since then, they've been great and given me no problems. I feel like I could stand or walk for hours in these.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Keef

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive but nice shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These black and white Chacos look good with so much of what I wear. I was initially concerned because they don't provide as much as support as my other pair of Chacos, but my feet never feel sore when I wear these. I also like that the straps don't go in-between my toes. These are one of my favorite shoes in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Morin

customer_reviews.title: Best footwear ever,
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing the same pair of Chaco sandals for over 7 years now. I wear them everyday in the spring, summer, fall, they just started to show real signs or wear last summer. Always comfortable and the toughest shoe I have ever worn. Stay away from the ones with the toe loop.
customer_reviews.author: Jake CNY

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 9.5. I ordered a 9. These were comically long, even compared to other Chacos I have tried on. Also, the strap is so long that it drags on the ground. The pattern is cute, though.
customer_reviews.author: DrC

customer_reviews.title: Horrible blisters.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter, we understood from reviews that they needed to be broke in. Wore them for 2 months before a trip. Caused horrible blisters regardless of breaking them in. Was never able to use them for their intended purpose. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sera N

customer_reviews.title: Finally, my toe is free!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my Chacos, the only problem was that after a while, my toe felt too uncomfortable and constricted. This new pair is cute, functional, and finally my toes are happy as they can be. Use them for hiking and walking around. Great sandal.
customer_reviews.author: LadyZhenJi

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: I love Chacos, so when my last pair (of 10 years) needed to be traded in, I came to Amazon and found these! I love how versatile Chacos can be. You can dress them up or down. They also add good arch support! They last for years and they are so comfy. I will say that Chacos in general run a tad big for my foot--I usually wear a 7 but I always get a 6.5 in Chacos and they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Seems to run a bit big...If you're not looking for a heavy sandal you may reconsider buying these.
customer_reviews.text: These were a little larger than I expected and I really didn't like that. They also weigh a lot...that aspect isn't really a flaw in the product, just more of not what I was looking for. The straps were very easy to adjust to my liking, so it was easy to make them comfortable. Just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: StefRamsay

customer_reviews.title: According to my grand, I am cool when I wear them
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter begged for some because they’re are sooooo comfy and cool’ and then she picked out a pair for me so I too can be cool. They are a tiny bit heavier than I expected but they are durable and feel fine
customer_reviews.author: Beth Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Fits tight
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. I have really fat feet so they don’t fit well. They don’t hurt my feet, but I wish I could’ve gotten a wide. Not sure if they offer wide with sizes. They are very convenient and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jamissia Macklin

customer_reviews.title: Never buying these from any other site
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Chacos. Glad I ordered a beautiful pair through amazon, and was able to use Prime shipping and my smile accout to benefit the ASPCA. If I was going to purchase them anyway, may as well do it from a website where I know I will be satisfied and can give back, even in a small way.
customer_reviews.author: twood

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is the Best Place to Buy Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Chacos come highly recommended. They do not work for me. What does work for me however, is Amazon’s return policy. Not only do they usually have my favorite shoes for cheaper, but I can wear them for 30 days to see how they work out. That saved me from wasting good money on shoes that just aren’t made for me.
customer_reviews.author: RYLRBR

customer_reviews.title: Chacos
customer_reviews.text: These caches are chic and comfortable. Perfect for summer hikes and canoeing. Very comfortable. The adjustable straps make it easy to tighten or loosen as needed. High quality product.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Chacos never disappoint
customer_reviews.text: They arrived today and I could not be more excited. These are my second pair of chacos. The fit is perfect. They are not too narrow and look super cute. I am remarkably impressed with how much more comfortable they are than my others. The strap design on these is ridiculously cute and comfy. They were super simple to adjust. I have absolutely nothing bad to say. They are my favorite shoes I've ever purchased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Mefford

customer_reviews.title: I love this style
customer_reviews.text: I love this style! I can walk much easier in these sandals than the ones that wrap around my toe! The blues are very vibrant, too!! Came within a week of ordering!
customer_reviews.author: KStewart

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR FLAT FEET!
customer_reviews.text: Very hard sole! I have a flat foot, and these shoes were painful to my feet. On the inside where the strap comes up, was painful! I wore them for about 10 minutes around the house, and I already almost had a blister!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love the support.
customer_reviews.text: Following advice from other reviewers, I ordered an 8 M. I am normally 8-8.5 AA. The Medium fit my narrow foot perfectly. The 8 is a tad long in the toe, but the distance from the heel to the arch is perfect. Love the arch support! Immediately the stress came off my knees, groin muscles and lower back. The soles are firm, not as squishy as some other sport sandals, which I like. Would definitely recommend them for over-pronators. Can walk all day in these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No size 7 wide width :(
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoe. Wanted to love it more. The length was perfect. The width was not. Unfortunately, Chaco doesn't make size 7 wide width for the plain black colour. If I had $130+ then I could create my own. -_- Big let down :/ I really don't like the other ones as much. Box was completely beat up, but I don't mind. I am returning these shoes and don't plan to buy another pair unless they finally decide to make this shoe and colour available in my size.
customer_reviews.author: DreMarie

customer_reviews.title: I Love My Chacos!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoe to wear on a hot day. I wear them hiking as much as I can and have also worn them kayaking and for day/night wear. Love their versatility and comfort, plus the ease of washing them off in the shower after a long day on the trail. Love them so much that I bought another pair of Chacos that I found on sale during our last trip. Chaco Love!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoe and I got it for a great price on Amazon. Definitely don't pay full price at REI.
customer_reviews.text: I feel so lucky to have gotten these at such an amazing price. I love my chacos! This is my third pair and they are the best shoes ever for plantar fasciitis. And, these are very cute.I think anyways, my teenage daughter thinks they're ugly, but what does she know. :-)
customer_reviews.author: sixteen again

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these here cheaper because I wasn't sure if I would like them and didn't want to pay full price. As far as I can tell they are authentic and I love them! Great shoes, but you still have to ease into wearing them like any shoe, as the texture your foot is on can get painful.
customer_reviews.author: CJ1792

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: these chacos are perfect!!! they fit with socks or no socks and the price cannot be beat. I was worried about the color getting really dirty, but they are holding up just fine from almost daily use and hiking and backpacking with them. they fit well and dry quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Talley Cain

customer_reviews.title: The arch on these shoes are not like my other chaos- it's the exact same shoe
customer_reviews.text: The arch on these shoes are not like my other chaos- it's the exact same shoe, but it's like the sole is defective. Didn't realize in time to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine W

customer_reviews.title: Still awesome sandals, even if not so fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Chaco's soles have become a little more flexible since I last purchased a pair, and they are even better at supporting a natural walk with good muscle usage. Everytime I wear them for any distance over 2 miles, its like my feet are getting a massage,and a good stretch. Even with achilles tendonitis, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: amphibia

customer_reviews.title: Not for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to take off stars but the style didn't work for me. I have narrow feet so I slipped out the front, which is why I noted they are somewhat large (in width only not length). I returned to try the style that wraps around the toe instead. Looks like excellent shoe and I love the quality of Chacos.
customer_reviews.author: TravelMom

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. It took me a while to order these, but so glad I did. I wear an 8.5-9 shoe. The 8 fits me perfect. My daughter wears a 9.5-10 shoe and fits into the 9 perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: GGirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Can not write enough great things about these shoes! I have a narrow foot and they fit perfectly. These shoes fit true to size and are on point with all other brands. They are extremely easy to clean and rinse off which is great for outdoors and they dry easily!
customer_reviews.author: Rusti Grandstaff

customer_reviews.title: Adventure approved!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these sandals! My first pair of hiking sandals and I got through a great hike (with a bit of rock climbing, walking through a creek, and swimming) without any discomfort or even a hint of a blister! Little pebbles did get into the bottoms quite a bit but I don't think that can be avoided when hiking in sandals. Excited to wear these on many more adventures!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D

customer_reviews.title: Not for triangle-shaped feet
customer_reviews.text: These can fit my wide feet or my narrow heels, but not both at the same time. Very unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Racine

customer_reviews.title: Flat foot support that doesn't flatten out
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet!! But I am also on my feet a lot! I've tried all the others. These and Birkenstocks are the only sandals that have REAL support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Straps are way too long and not the same length on each shoe
customer_reviews.text: The straps/lacing is not good have a narrow foot but have purchased 2 other pair I purchased in store they fit perfectly Do you sell seconds on line orders not happy with this pair
customer_reviews.author: cheri

customer_reviews.title: SO NARROW
customer_reviews.text: I have small , regular narrowed feet. The length of the sandal fits perfect, but they are so narrow to the point where I had the hard heel affect all over my feet. They were fine for walking around town, but hiking all day is painful in these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blisters
customer_reviews.text: These are so uncomfortable! I bought them for a trip and got blisters on the bottoms of both of my feet the first day I wore them. 👎 😔 Also, they are very heavy and bulky. I find Tevas to be a lot more comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Chaco sandals
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sandals. My other pair is over 20 years old & has stood up to years of walking beaches. This new pair is feminine looking, tough as nails & offers good arch support. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy R.

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair in almost twenty years. They are my everyday walking shoes. They offer great support that never 'goes flat. Because they are so open and dry quickly, they are perfect for wet conditions. I will always own a pair of Chacos.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: My young adult daughter wore these all over Europe
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, fit and cute enough to go with most outfits. She wore all over Europe including hiking and trekking through low water. They have held up well and still going strong. I'm sure she will buy some more once these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: L. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal for Water
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect water sandal. We wear water shoes at the Water Parks with all the walking around, stair climbing and water everywhere, these shoes are great for in and out of water. No slip, easily adjustable to secure to your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Love2

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy sandal for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy sandal for outdoors. The arch is quite high which can be a bit uncomfortable at times, but it provides lots of support!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L

customer_reviews.title: Love these, but flat-footers beware!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I waited to so long to own a pair of Chacos! These are awesome shoes; I wear them basically everywhere now! However, if you have flat feet, you may want to wear them in small spurts around the house while your feet get used to the arch support!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Montileone

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and last forever
customer_reviews.text: My favorite summer shoe! Working by the pool or going out for a walk these are always my first pick. My last pair lasted me 8 years until the sole fell apart and we are avid hikers. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable all day sandal
customer_reviews.text: I tried Chacos a few years ago and made the mistake of getting a pair with the toe loop. I delt with them but never thought they lived up to the hype my husband made about Chacos (he's been wearing them 15 yrs.) I've been wearing croc flip flops and tevas for a few years but now need more arch support postpartum. Wish I had tried these years ago! They fit great (order down if you're a half size). I can easily wear them all day chasing after kids, cooking and working in the yard, walking...Arch support is just what I needed when I don't want to wear tennis shoes. Don't hesitate!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes EVER
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this shoe! The patriotic design is so cool, but not obnoxious. I absolutely love Chacos. I have horrible feet and can wear few shoes. I LIVE in my Chacos! They are so comfortable and a life saver for me!
customer_reviews.author: Vwink

customer_reviews.title: Love the style
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has other styles and colors. I noticed this one and she hadn’t seen it so I showed it to her and she loved it and wanted solid black instead of getting colorful ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Hobbs Long

customer_reviews.title: I love these chacos
customer_reviews.text: I love these chacos. They are very easy to get on, Comfortable, and they fit as expected. I normally wear a 6 but I got a 7 so I could have some room and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: I love chacos. I like these better than the Z-3 with the big toe strap personally. They are extremely comfortable and durable. Love them. I can walk miles with my dog in them without foot pain. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and they fit perfect! I went a little out of my comfort zone and got orange but they are absolutely perfect!! Not the greatest photo and maybe I’ll skip the blue polish but these are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Comfort you may have to get used to.
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable... after you get used to them. It almost as if you have to break them in. The straps adjust nicely to get the feel that you are looking for... The sole was what took some getting used to. HOWEVER. Now.... I love them. They are so comfortable to work, play and walk in. I am considering walking all day at the theme park with them.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crazy high arch!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute on... but the arch is just ridiculous. Way too high for an average foot! Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: KimW

customer_reviews.title: these are amazing. a friend recommended them after another well known ...
customer_reviews.text: these are amazing. a friend recommended them after another well known brand fell apart. They are great for arch support and have enough sole that you don't feel the rocks in the water or tree branches etc. on a trail . If you need sandals that are more than cute, and want them to use as a walking sandal these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Best decision ever
customer_reviews.text: Alright listen so i have wanted chacos for two and a half years (a girl at my first had them and I was in love). I have terrible feet and wearing Converse or Vans for a whole day can make my feet sore. These bad boys, YOU CAN LOOSEN THE STRAPS LIKE CLOSER TO YOUR TOES AND IM ASTONISHED BECAUSE I HAVE FAT FEET AND I DIDNT KNOW THIS ABOUT CHACOS! I'm an 8 in Nike and I ordered and 8 and they fit perfect. I can tell they are gonna rub the bottom of my feet but they just gotta toughen up. 10/10 would recommend ❤️🙌
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for camping and hiking. They’re super cute and fit well! The only downside is that small rocks and pebbles sneak in and it can be difficult to get them out. They’re also heavier than my normal shoes/sandals so I feel like I’m stomping around a lot, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Corrie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Our favourite sandals for the family. My and hubby's previous pairs lasted for 8 to 10 years. We had hiked, cycled and worn them everywhere. Bought this pair for my 60yo mum for its non-slip soles. Image shown looks more like lavendar but more blue in actual item. Not a big issue on the colour. Still loving these sturdy sandals.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: great arch suport.
customer_reviews.text: Love chakos. Tevas have inadequate arch support. My only complaint is not in half sizes. Toe is a little long for me. But the same is true for Tevas.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Love my Chacos!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Chacos! Plantar fasciitis seems to have vanished, the shoes are cute, and they’re great for everyday walks and hiking Stone Mountain.
customer_reviews.author: On Beyond Zebra

customer_reviews.title: Not for me but quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: Personally I did not find these shoes comfy so I resold them. There are quality shoes but just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I needed to have some high arched shoes and these are perfect! Took a couple of days to get use ...
customer_reviews.text: I have ankles that roll in and cause issues. I needed to have some high arched shoes and these are perfect! Took a couple of days to get use to them, but now I wear them EVERYWHERE!
customer_reviews.author: languagelady

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe, but it tightens up on my foot as I wear it and needs regular adjusting throughout the day. Hopefully it will eventually settle down
customer_reviews.author: bz3000

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable straps make this a secure, comfortable sandal
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are adjustable, so you can get a perfect fit. I especially appreciated the arch support. It was perfectly positioned for my high arches, but I've heard others say it was uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: onliner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I’ve heard positive Chaco reviews from so many people and they didn’t disappoint! Chacos are very comfortable and supportive. The open toe version is my preference.
customer_reviews.author: wood j

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but a bit on the heavy side
customer_reviews.text: You have to break them in but once you do itll be worth it. Very comfortable but a bit on the heavy side. I'm not a big fan of how bulky they are but I do wear a 10 in women's so that may be part of the problem. :]
customer_reviews.author: Mo Love

product_meta.title: Chaco - Womens Zx1 Classic Sandals
product_meta.description: Streamlined and dependable since 1989, our Classic series is comprised of only 8 component parts, making for the simple, timeless sandal design that made our name. Every pair comes standard with adjustable double-straps that custom-fits to your foot, plus our podiatrist-certified LUVSEAT PU footbed for all-day comfort and support. Now featuring ChacoGrip rubber for our best performing Classic outsole to date. Experience our Classic Sandal like never before.
feature_bullets: Double-strapped polyester jacquard webbing upper wraps around the foot and through the midsole for a customized fit
Adjustable and durable high-tensile webbing heel risers
Women's specific LUVSEAT PU midsole, Antimicrobial application for odor control, Vegan-friendly construction
Non-marking ChacoGrip rubber compound, 3mm lug depth in Outsole
